verses.text: The \w book|strong="G0976"\w* of the \w generation|strong="G1078"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, the \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, the \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*.

\w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Phares|strong="G5329"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Zara|strong="G2196"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Thamar|strong="G2283"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Phares|strong="G5329"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Esrom|strong="G2074"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Esrom|strong="G2074"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Aram|strong="G0689"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Aram|strong="G0689"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Aminadab|strong="G0284"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Aminadab|strong="G0284"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Naasson|strong="G3476"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Naasson|strong="G3476"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Salmon|strong="G4533"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Salmon|strong="G4533"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Booz|strong="G1003"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Rachab|strong="G4477"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Booz|strong="G1003"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Obed|strong="G5601"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w Ruth|strong="G4503"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Obed|strong="G5601"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Jesse|strong="G2421"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesse|strong="G2421"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* the \w king|strong="G0935"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* the \w king|strong="G0935"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Solomon|strong="G4672"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w her|strong="G3588"\w* \add that had been the wife\add* of \w Urias|strong="G3774"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Solomon|strong="G4672"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Roboam|strong="G4497"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Roboam|strong="G4497"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Abia|strong="G0007"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Abia|strong="G0007"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Asa|strong="G0760"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Asa|strong="G0760"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Josaphat|strong="G2498"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Josaphat|strong="G2498"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Joram|strong="G2496"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Joram|strong="G2496"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Ozias|strong="G3604"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Ozias|strong="G3604"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Joatham|strong="G2488"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Joatham|strong="G2488"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Achaz|strong="G0881"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Achaz|strong="G0881"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Ezekias|strong="G1478"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Ezekias|strong="G1478"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Manasses|strong="G3128"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Manasses|strong="G3128"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Amon|strong="G0300"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Amon|strong="G0300"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Josias|strong="G2502"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Josias|strong="G2502"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Jechonias|strong="G2423"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* his \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, about the \w time|strong="G1909"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were carried away \w to|strong="G3350"\w* \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* they were brought \w to|strong="G3350"\w* \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w*, \w Jechonias|strong="G2423"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Salathiel|strong="G4528"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Salathiel|strong="G4528"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Zorobabel|strong="G2216"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Zorobabel|strong="G2216"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Abiud|strong="G0010"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Abiud|strong="G0010"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Eliakim|strong="G1662"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Eliakim|strong="G1662"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Azor|strong="G0107"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Azor|strong="G0107"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Sadoc|strong="G4524"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Sadoc|strong="G4524"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Achim|strong="G0885"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Achim|strong="G0885"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Eliud|strong="G1664"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Eliud|strong="G1664"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="G1648"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Eleazar|strong="G1648"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Matthan|strong="G3157"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w Matthan|strong="G3157"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w* \w begat|strong="G1080"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* the \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* was \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, who is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w generations|strong="G1074"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \add are\add* \w fourteen|strong="G1180"\w* \w generations|strong="G1074"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w until|strong="G2193"\w* the carrying away \w into|strong="G3350"\w* \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w* \add are\add* \w fourteen|strong="G1180"\w* \w generations|strong="G1074"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the carrying away \w into|strong="G3350"\w* \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w* \w unto|strong="G2193"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add are\add* \w fourteen|strong="G1180"\w* \w generations|strong="G1074"\w*.

Â¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w birth|strong="G1083"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* on this \w wise|strong="G3779"\w*: When \w as|strong="G1063"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother|strong="G3384"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* was \w espoused|strong="G3423"\w* to \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*, \w before|strong="G4250"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* came \w together|strong="G4905"\w*, she was \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w with|strong="G2192"\w* \w child|strong="G1064"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*, \w being|strong="G5607"\w* a \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \add man\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w willing|strong="G2309"\w* to \w make|strong="G3856"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* a publick \w example|strong="G3856"\w*, was \w minded|strong="G1014"\w* to \w put|strong="G0630"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w away|strong="G0630"\w* \w privily|strong="G2977"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w while|strong="G1760"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* thought \w on|strong="G1760"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w appeared|strong="G5316"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* a \w dream|strong="G3677"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w*, thou \w son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, \w fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to take unto \w thee|strong="G3880"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*: for \w that|strong="G1063"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w conceived|strong="G1080"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* she shall bring \w forth|strong="G5088"\w* a \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thou shalt \w call|strong="G2564"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w JESUS|strong="G2424"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* was \w done|strong="G1096"\w*, that \w it|strong="G2443"\w* might be \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w spoken|strong="G4483"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

\w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, a \w virgin|strong="G3933"\w* shall \w be|strong="G2192"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w child|strong="G1064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall bring \w forth|strong="G5088"\w* a \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they shall \w call|strong="G2564"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w Emmanuel|strong="G1694"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* being \w interpreted|strong="G3177"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Joseph|strong="G2501"\w* being \w raised|strong="G1326"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w sleep|strong="G5258"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* had \w bidden|strong="G4367"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* took unto \w him|strong="G3880"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w till|strong="G2193"\w* she had brought \w forth|strong="G5088"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w firstborn|strong="G4416"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w JESUS|strong="G2424"\w*.
